location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Views on Quetta-Nushki-Siestan [Sistan] Trade Route: No. 6. View of Sandhills near trade route, west of Yadgar'

mods.abstract: The photograph shows a semi-arid landscape with some sandy hills and light vegetation. In the middle ground of the other photograph are three men on horseback. Yadgar (sometimes referred to as Yadgar Chauki) is located between Nushki and Dalbandin in western Pakistan. The photograph was probably taken by H A Armstrong, Assistant Superintendent, Indian Telegraph Department.
